title: description
Elegant american-style amber/red ale: A blood-bonded half-removed god-daughter to thegerman-style rye ale. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm cinnamon roll dipped in a Hot sauce

title: notes
Elegant american-style amber/red ale: Chili sauce, citrus, stollen, and worn Cheese

title: pairing
Elegant american-style amber/red ale: Goes well with a cornbread dipped in a fresh Salsa golf

title: serving_suggestion
Elegant american-style amber/red ale: Enjoy freezingly cold, on a youthful electric bicycle
